title: Validation report for ogc.geosrs.srs - SRS Core Ontology

entries.message:
Validation result for _sources/srs/rules.shacl:
  Validation Report
  Conforms: False
  Results (11):
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:CompoundCRS_includesSRS_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CompoundCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:includesSRS
  	Message: A compound coordinate reference system should consist of at least one single coordinate reference system
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:ParametricCRS_datum_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/ParametricCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:datum
  	Message: A parametric coordinate reference system should have exactly one parametric datum
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:ProjectedCRS_conversion_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/ProjectedCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:conversion
  	Message: A projected coordinate reference system should have at least one conversion
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):

  	Source Shape: geosrs:TemporalCRS_datum_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/TemporalCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:datum
  	Message: A projected coordinate reference system should have exactly one temporal datum
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:GeodeticCRS_coordinateSystem_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/GeodeticCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:coordinateSystem
  	Message: A geodetic coordinate reference system should have exactly one geodetic coordinate system
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:GeographicCRS_coordinateSystem_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/GeographicCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:coordinateSystem
  	Message: A geographic coordinate reference system should have exactly one ellipsoidal coordinate system
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:GeographicCRS_datum_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/GeographicCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:datum
  	Message: A geographic coordinate reference system should have exactly one geodetic datum
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:SingleCRS_datum_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/SingleCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:datum
  	Message: A single coordinate reference system should have exactly one datum
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:SingleCRS_coordinateSystem_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/SingleCRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:coordinateSystem
  	Message: A single coordinate reference system should have exactly one coordinate system
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):
  	Severity: sh:Violation
  	Source Shape: geosrs:CRS_domainOfValidity_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:domainOfValidity
  	Message: A coordinate reference system should have at least one area of use
  Constraint Violation in MinCountConstraintComponent (http://www.w3.org/ns/shacl#MinCountConstraintComponent):

  	Source Shape: geosrs:CRS_coordinateSystem_Shape_Property
  	Focus Node: <https://w3id.org/geosrs/CRS>
  	Result Path: geosrs:coordinateSystem
